phase1.title: Journey — The dawn of doubts
phase1.narrative:
🌟 "They told me they were all monsters...
✨ They told me so much evil, so many misfortunes about them...
🔍 But I preferred to go and see with my own eyes."

phase2.title: Journey — The light
phase2.narrative:
🤔 "Who were they really?...
And I saw...

👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 A father... a mother... children...

💙 All simply seeking
to live
their best life...
Like me."

phase3.title: Journey — The shadow of clouds
phase3.narrative:
🌙 "Then the moon appeared.
📖 The sky darkened like a page burned by time.
🦈 A fin split the dark waves...
⚡ Lightning streaked the gray clouds."

phase4.title: Journey — The black clouds
phase4.narrative:
⚡ "Chapter 2 began in darkness...
🌊 The waves became higher, more threatening.
💀 And in this darkness, I saw something else...
👁️ Gazes staring at me from the depths."

phase5.title: Journey — The silence of the soul
phase5.narrative:
👁️ "In the darkness, a first vision appeared to me...
🔮 Strange forms danced in the shadows.
🌟 Was it real? Was it a dream?
❓ I could no longer tell the difference."

phase6.title: Journey — Crossing the night
phase6.narrative:
🤷 "But the more I advanced, the more my certainties were shaken...
💭 Who was right? Who was wrong?
🌊 The waves carried away my convictions.
🔍 I had to dig deeper."

phase7.title: Journey — The humanity of hearts
phase7.narrative:
💡 "Suddenly, a light pierced the clouds...
📜 A partial truth revealed itself to me.
⚖️ Neither all white, nor all black...
🌈 But a gradient of complex colors."

phase8.title: Journey — The outstretched hand
phase8.narrative:
📖 "Thus ended the first chapter of my journey...
🎭 Between masks and real faces.
🚪 A door opened to new mysteries.
➡️ It was time to continue exploring."

phase9.title: Journey — True hospitality
phase9.narrative:
💭 "They told me...
that humanity no longer existed,
that it had been lost in wars and grudges.
🏠 They told me that men no longer welcomed anyone,
that they locked themselves behind walls of iron and fear."

phase10.title: Journey — Freedom of the soul
phase10.narrative:
✋ "But I saw...
A hand extended to a stranger.
😊 A smile shared despite hunger.
🚪 A door opened for one who trembled in the night."

phase11.title: Journey — Shared strength
phase11.narrative:
🤝 "This is hospitality:
not giving what we have too much of,
but sharing even what is lacking."

phase12.title: Journey — Love stronger
phase12.narrative:
🗽 "They told me that freedom was just a word,
an illusion that the powerful sold to the weak.
🏃‍♂️ But I saw...
A child running barefoot in the rain,
laughing without chains,
✨ and in his laughter, I understood that freedom lives first in the soul."

intro.title: Little Boat
intro.subtitle: A philosophical journey
intro.message: Embark on the discovery of truth about humanity...
